actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend title V of the Motor Vehicle Information and Cost Savings Act to provide that the average fuel economy standard for 1995 and later model years be 40 miles per gallon.

summary.text: Amends the Motor Vehicle Information and Cost Savings Act to direct that the average fuel economy standard for 1995 and later model years shall be 40 miles per gallon.

titles.title: A bill to amend title V of the Motor Vehicle Information and Cost Savings Act to provide that the average fuel economy standard for 1995 and later model years be 40 miles per gallon.
